title: WTB Cobb Red Portrait PSA or SGC graded 3-5
author: BLongley

posts.post_title: WTB Cobb Red Portrait PSA or SGC graded 3-5
posts.post_content:
Looking for a solid Red Port with nice centering, light corner wear and wrinkles are ok, but no creases across Cobbs image. Ideally a solid grade of 3-4. No back preference, Piedmont, Sweet Cap, etc all ok... and could also be interested in rarer backs as well. 

Thanks 
Brian
